Uses of Package
pongproject

Classes in pongproject used by pongproject
Ball
          The class that contains the graphical information for the ball
BallMovement
          Contains the metthods that determine and place the next position of the ball
BallOption
          The frame that contains the ball's options
Paddle
          Contains the information to draw the graphical representation of the paddles
PaddleMovement
          Contains the methods that calculate where the paddles will move.
PaddleOption
          The frame that contains the options for the paddles
PlayOption
          Contians the options for the players
PongCanvas
          The Canvas that enables the games to be drawn within the frame.
PongColor
          The Color generator's
PongGUI
          The main frame of the program.
PongProjectApp
          The main class of the application.
Score
          The class that allows to draw the score upon the screen
